summary: THE CONSUMER HAD THE RECALL REPAIR COMPLETED ON 12/01 (RECALL # 01V390000).  APPROXIMATELY ONE YEAR LATER THE VEHICLE OVERHEATED WHILE DRIVING WHICH RESULTED IN THE HEAD GASKET BLOWING.  THE DEALER DETERMINED THE PROBLEM WAS RELATED TO THE ENGINE FAN WHICH SEIZED.  ON 12/02 THE RADIATOR BOILED AND THE DEALER DIAGNOSED IT AS   A DEFECTIVE FAN MODULE.  THE CONSUMER HAD TO PAY FOR THE REPAIRS.   *TS   *CB  *JB
